channel.title: “A Flash of Light, Then Nothing” - Dadmother
channel.description:
Hey, everyone! This is my first time actually sharing music with the rest of the Auxy community. This is my most recent released track, but I’ve been hard at work and am sitting on a handful of other sounds. I’m open to all criticism, questions, or comments. I hope you enjoy!
https://dadmother.bandcamp.com/track/a-flash-of-light-then-nothing

item.title: “A Flash of Light, Then Nothing” - Dadmother
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
Forgot that I hadn’t fully integrated everything over to SoundCloud yet when I put this out. Here’s a dang ol’ SoundCloud link and a somewhat shameless bump for the first track I ever shared with this community.
https://soundcloud.com/dadmother/a-flash-of-light-then-nothing

Read full topic

item.title: “A Flash of Light, Then Nothing” - Dadmother
item.dc:creator: Maland2016
item.description:
DUDE! This reminds me of the TRON Legacy OST by my robot boys Daft Punk!

Really pleasant to listen to, has a very nice atmosphere to it. We gotta collab sometime, if, y’know, you’d be down for that.
